subtitleNullable: Data on all Pokemon up to Generation 8
descriptionNullable:
# Content
This Pokemon data set contains 1118 different Pokemon.  Most of the data was pulled from [PokeAPI](https://pokeapi.co/). Other data sources include [PokemonDB](https://pokemondb.net/), [Serebii](http://serebii.net/), [Bulbapedia](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Main_Page), and [Pokemon Wiki](https://pokemon.fandom.com/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Wiki).

Pokemon with special forms (e.g. Mega Evolutions, G-Max, etc.) have their own data entry for the special forms.



***Update: 8/12/2021***
- Fixed incorrect `egg_groups` entries 
- Added `shape` and `can_evolve`

***Update: 8/24/2021***
- Replaced comma separators with tilde (~)
- Added `genus`, `baby_pokemon`, `egg_cycle`
- Split `legendary/mythical` feature to `legendary` and`mythical` variables
title: Complete Pokemon Data Set
subtitle: Data on all Pokemon up to Generation 8
description:
# Content
This Pokemon data set contains 1118 different Pokemon.  Most of the data was pulled from [PokeAPI](https://pokeapi.co/). Other data sources include [PokemonDB](https://pokemondb.net/), [Serebii](http://serebii.net/), [Bulbapedia](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Main_Page), and [Pokemon Wiki](https://pokemon.fandom.com/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Wiki).

Pokemon with special forms (e.g. Mega Evolutions, G-Max, etc.) have their own data entry for the special forms.



***Update: 8/12/2021***
- Fixed incorrect `egg_groups` entries 
- Added `shape` and `can_evolve`

***Update: 8/24/2021***
- Replaced comma separators with tilde (~)
- Added `genus`, `baby_pokemon`, `egg_cycle`
- Split `legendary/mythical` feature to `legendary` and`mythical` variables
